author: Zachary Bohlman
comment: First time couldn't find it in Android wear so I uninstalled and tried again. Worked. Looks F A N T A S T I C on my Moto 360. We'll see how it affects battery life, I'll update my review later. So far it's worth it. ************************** UPDATE: AFTER MOVING TO 5.1.1 I HAVE TWO "FLAT TIRE" ISSUES INSTEAD OF JUST THE ONE AND THE PARALAX EFFECT IS GONE.  Please address. Is it still a Motorola issue six months later?

reply.author: maxelus.net
reply.content:
The gyroscope does not work properly after upgrading to 5.1.1 Moto 360.
Motorola switched off the gyro accidentaly on the last (Android) update. They did not explicity advertised the gyro, and all functions work with out gyro, so it has no priority to fix the issue. :(  This is Motorola issue :(

title: Awesome

author: Stuart Tapsell
comment: Makes the Sony smartwatch 3 look really futuristic. Your wallpapers are amazing and now android wear brilliant. It's like your in my head with your designs. I can confirm zero battery drain on sw3.
title: Awesome

author: Nolan Bosher
comment: I noticed a considerable amount of battery drain from this one but I love everything this group puts out. I have not had my moto360 die before I get home from work after a 10 hour day but it is in desperate need of the charger. Still a great face.
title: Really like using this!

author: Jim Hall
comment: Flat tire is on top and it doesn't respond to the motion sensors.   Who's to blame android wear or...  please fix.

reply.author: maxelus.net
reply.content:
The gyroscope does not work properly after upgrading to 5.1.1 Moto 360.

title: Was my favorite until

author: Laura West
comment: Out of alignment with my watch. Can't see the analoge properly and there's a black bar across the top of the screen. Don't buy this if you have a Fossil watch!

author: ezridr1234
comment: Guess I was wrong, you haven't fixed it yet. It's been months now, got a replacement watch this week after waiting 5 weeks and this app still don't work right. The face on the moto is way off Center. The date and minute indicators are all a lot lower than they should be. Can't read the date due to being down into the dead spot and the minute second arrows are about a 3rd of the way down to the center of the watch. Uninstalling! This app runs on the phone all the time even when not applied also!
title: Immediate problems dawg! Edit

author: Dinico Win
comment: Need low bit ambiance mode. Potential screen burn in. Optimization needed.  G watch room on 5.1. And Galaxy s6 edge
title: Uhhgg

author: brent singer
comment: Wow this is amazing! Stumbled on it by accident and simply love it! And I'm picky. Well done, very well done sir!

author: Kevin Luzier
comment: Terrific-looking watch backgrounds that react to your accelerometer movements just enough to make it even more interesting, yet not distract from telling the time. Plus, being able to set it to swap the backgrounds at regular intervals is a real benefit to me. There are some great watch faces out there, but this is my favorite. Very nicely done! Looks and works great on the ZenWatch, and no problems with battery life.
title: Excellent appearance and options

author: Susan Pal
comment: This looks to be a nice watch face, but it has no settings options on my smart watch which runs Android Wear 2.0. Whenever I select this watch face it only gives me the blue animated background with no other options for customizations. Dev, can you please look into this and update it for AW 2.0?

author: Michael Curley
comment: My Moto 360 looks totally nuts. If there are matching wallpapers for my Nexus 6 so I can match my background to my watch, I'd buy in a second!
title: Fantastic!

author: Angel Velazquez
comment: This developer always has high quality wallpapers!  I cant stop looking at my moto 360 now!
title: Never dissatisfied,  Amazing!

author: Mihai Munteanu
comment: Great efects! Superb! I gave 4 stars because i had a moto 360 first edition and the watchface was not compatible animore.

title: Great efects! Superb!

author: Ben Goodman
comment: You're almost there. The only reason I kept this was because the digital clock works ok on the Moto 360. The analog clock does not. Its as if the view is zoomed in too far. Check it out and fix it, and I'm happy to re-rate.
title: Almost

comment: I want to like it but it looks jank on the Moto 360.  It's off center, destroying the look making it unusable and a waste of money. Dev said be patient in other reviews as they are fixing but there's been no fix.

comment: Need some more backgrounds that are duller or easier for the analogue clock face to stand out.

author: Master Chief
comment: Works good. Like the parallax effect. The backgrounds are kind of boring though.
title: Neat

author: Michael W
comment: This is definitely a next gen face! Amazing. Next update, please enable a way to increase the time you can keep the face running. Great job on this Dev!

comment: Excellent in what it has, but limited options. Give us more backgrounds, seconds markers and choices. Almost perfect!
